stage.stageDesciption: Checking if the user exists in database
Finding the sum of the salary of the employee over the years
stage.sqlProcessing: SELECT SUM(salary) FROM employees as e join salaries as s on e.emp_no = s.emp_no where e.emp_no=10001;

stage.stageDesciption: Get the current department managers of each department
stage.sqlProcessing: SELECT * FROM employees as e ,dept_manager as m, departments as d where e.emp_no = m.emp_no and m.dept_no = d.dept_no and to_date = '9999-01-01';

stage.stageDesciption: Get the current title of the given employee
stage.sqlProcessing: SELECT t.title FROM employees as e, titles as t where e.emp_no = t.emp_no and e.emp_no = 10001;

stage.stageDesciption: Defining the Bonus based on department
stage.sqlProcessing: SELECT d.dept_no FROM departments as d, employees as e , dept_emp as de where e.emp_no = de.emp_no and d.dept_no = de.dept_no and e.emp_no = 10001;
